website_summaries.verdict: This is a nice choice for baking cookies, cakes, or bars. Decent price for two jars, as well.
pros: 88 Acres' sunflower seed butter is nice and rich
The dark chocolate certainly adds indulgence
This butter is so rich that a little goes a long way
cons: The texture may be too grainy for some

customer_reviews.title: One of the two containers I ordered arrived OPEN in the box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product--tastes great and wonderfully healthy, BUT one of the two containers I ordered arrived to my home OPEN and oozing all over the inside of the box and it appears there is no way for me to return the item or receive a replacement for the damaged container. I am writing this review to alert other people to this problem. We need to have a way to return damaged products!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible unless mixed with other stuff
customer_reviews.text: Taste is terrible. No maple flavor, no saltiness of when you eat roasted sunflower seeds. I'm just going to mix it with other ingredients in smoothies because it's not palatable. I'm giving it another 2 stars for 2 reasons: takes care of my body's high need for healthier proteine and if mixed with chocolate tahini it no longer tastes awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these 88 acres seed butters are super delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these 88 acres seed butters are super delicious! I haven't had nut butters in my house for years because of my son's nut allergies. But he can enjoy these seed butters perfectly with no allergies at all. You can make ANYTHING with them that you would make with a nut butter (sandwiches, breads, smoothies, etc.) The nutritional content is virtually identical. The flavors are really yummy too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but the sweetened version is very sweet
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and nutritious, but much too sweet. I thought that 3g of added sugar would be subtlety sweet, but the sweetness is overpowering for us. I’m guessing because our family doesn’t eat sweetened nut or seed butter. I will try the unsweetened seed butter. My guess is that we will enjoy that more. Also, the product is quite runny from added oil. Not sure there is really a need to add extra oil, or maybe the added oil could be reduced? Watermelon seed butter is tasty, with a little bitterness on the finish. Reminds me of tahini.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I'm excited to have an organic, non-gmo, soy-free ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to have an organic, non-gmo, soy-free, and nut-free alternative for my nut allergy. I tried the pumpkin seed butter with my smoothie bowl, apples, and also topped it off with my rolled oats. It's delicious and filling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good for you treat!
customer_reviews.text: This dark chocolate seed butter spread is so delicious. It spreads great and is perfect on toast and my protein waffles. The amount of sugar is very low too! Try it. It is especially great for those with nut allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Smooth, ultra creamy texture- great taste-, love that there's no added sugar, which actually is what matters most to me. I can absolutely recommend this product and will absolutely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Demuth

customer_reviews.title: Funky/odd flavor
customer_reviews.text: For me...this was gross. I thought it was going to be a healthy alternative to morning toast with peanut butter. Ew. It's more like something that dangles between frosting and nut butter. I'd rather choose one or the other depending on my needs/craving. Sorry I wasted $ on a 2 pack of this. Right now, it's just a decoration. I stare at it but can't bear to throw it away ($$).
customer_reviews.author: Shopazon

customer_reviews.title: Do not be fooled by this product as there is no returning it very bad
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT STATES CLEARLY ORGANIC.. I'M A VEGETARIAN FOR ALMOST ALL MY LIFE & A NUTRITION CONSCIOUS PERSON.. I DON'T BELIEVE THIS PRODUCT IT'S NEITHER ORGANIC OR HEALTHY ON ANY LEVEL IT IS LOADED WITH FAT IT HAS SUGAR ADDED.. IT'S 25% FAT 8%SAT. FAT.. WHEN I OPENED IT IT WAS HALF FILLED WITH OIL NOT UNUSUAL FOR NATURAL NUT BUTTERS. ALTHOUGH WHEN I MAKE MY OWN THERE'S NO OIL AT TOP SETTLING.. I START THE OIL IN & IT IS LIKE WATER THE WHOLE NUT BUTTER IS WATERY AND IT TASTES REALLY BAD I SO MUCH WANTED TO LIKE THIS PRODUCT AND I WAS SO DISAPPOINTED NOT TO MENTION A WASTE OF $20
customer_reviews.author: Karen Abbruzzio

customer_reviews.title: Looks gross and tastes not so great
customer_reviews.text: I normally get the Organic Sunbutter, but thought I would try this one because I like to add honey or maple syrup to my "peanut butter" and celery and I couldn't find the Wildflower brand that I have bought before. This stuff looks like .... (use your imagination) and doesn't taste very good at all. While sunflower butter is generally runny, this stuff seems to be more so as well. The flavor isn't too horrible, it should still be fine in cookie recipes, but plain by it's self, it isn't tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So delicious
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to the dark chocolate sunflower seed butter. It tastes amazing and it's surprisingly LOW in sugar. If you're a Nutella fan, try this instead. It's great on toast or with pretzels. Love 88 Acres seed bars as well! Very impressed with everything I've tried from this company.
customer_reviews.author: jerseyJD

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! they make a perfect afternoon snack with some toast. The taste is very good and nutrition is there too. Delivery was also super quick. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Beat Deme

customer_reviews.title: Delicious with hints of watermelon taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like the light taste and the nutrients offered. It is expensive, so I will not buy all the time, but, definitely, occasionally, enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Watermelon seed butter
customer_reviews.text: This did not taste bad, it just tasted bland. The nutritional information showed it to be not much different than peanut butter, though, of course, it would be a welcome addition to the diets of those who cannot eat a lot of things that this DOESN'T have in it. It is very runny and is a very sticky runny, making it hard to get the last of each spoonful off the spoon. It would probably be a good addition to smoothies, but I don't drink those. I am using it up as a topping for ice cream, but will not be getting any more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these 88 acres seed butters are super delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these 88 acres seed butters are super delicious! I haven't had nut butters in my house for years because of my son's nut allergies. But he can enjoy these seed butters perfectly with no allergies at all. You can make ANYTHING with them that you would make with a nut butter (sandwiches, breads, smoothies, etc.) The nutritional content is virtually identical. The flavors are really yummy too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best nut butter
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I use this is my daily recovery shake after training. Since I do not use any sugar or products that contain sugar in my shakes. This adds the right amount of sweetness (and fat!) i need in my shake. 1 tablespoon and it totally changes the taste of your daily recovery shakes. I wish it wasn’t so expensive as I go through about a jar a week. You get what you pay for though! Also big plus in my book is no palm oil!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Uses Seed Oil which is toxic
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star butter if they didn’t use seed oil. Seed oil is very bad for one to consume. I personally have Hashimoto’s so this butter is far from healthy for me due to the seed oil used. They should consider using coconut or olive oils for a healthy change. That being said, it tastes very good! I hope they make the switch!
customer_reviews.author: jordan stiner

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: If you like sunflower seed you'll love this butter. For me, I wish it could be creamier, like a really smooth peanut butter, but I think most would find texture is fine.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: not too tasty
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is allergic to peanuts so I wanted to try this but it doesnst taste very good it's very bland and it went bad a lot faster than I thought it would. Really a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Nic

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Love 88 acres!! Between nut-free schools and my daughter’s low FODMAP diet requirements, meals and snacks have required a lot of creativity. 88 acres has saved us! We love the dark chocolate spread (like Nutella + PB in one!) and various 88 acres bars.
customer_reviews.author: R.F.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sweet - Not for me, but Good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make rolls. I didn't read through the ingredients, totally my fault. I assumed it was straight pumpkin seed butter. It's got a ton of sugar in it, which doesn't work for me. However, it looks very good quality. The butter is vibrant green and the consistency is quite nice and spreadable.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but sunflower seeds could be ground more
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty good, just a bit more lumpy than most sunflower butters and the salt was not dissolved (I crunched on salt at one point). Not bad but could be improved. When you get it, make sure you really stir, pulling up the settled parts from the bottom to improve the consistency that some people complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Good, but hard to mix.
customer_reviews.text: The watermelon seed butter tastes great! It’s an interesting alternative to peanut butter. The only downside to this was amount of mixing it took to get the oil and solids reincorporated. It was hard enough that I ended up bending my metal spoon and it took a good 5 minutes of vigorous stirring and mixing before it was good to go. Even then, there are a couple of small clumps left.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron David

customer_reviews.title: Taste is yucky
customer_reviews.text: I have a peanut allergy and have bought other sunflower butters but this was a really poor choice. It is incredibly bitter and I thought it would be a good topping for toast. Far too runny. Do not recommend. Also non-returnable - almost $20 for two jars that will go down the garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: theroseyposey

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am really hooked on this pumpkin butter! A bit pricey but worth the money if you can afford $28 for two containers...great with crackers of all kinds...I even lick a spoonful once in a while...
customer_reviews.author: ralphie boy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Can't get enough of this pumpkin butter. I prefer it to be a little thicker so I pour some oil off of the top before stirring up the jar. Great taste and so nutritional. I have been eating this for a couple of years. I add it to oatmeal, use it no sandwiches, in smoothies, etc. We have a peanut allergy in our family and sunbutter was not a hit. We prefer this to peanut butter now. 88 Acres has been great too. The safety heat seal was open on one of our orders. They responded to my message within hours and sent out a replacement order immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and nutritious too, don't buy if you can't stop when eating delicious nutritious foods. I love it. I eat right out of the jar or eat with spread on bread. My husband loves it too and so does my son and grandson. A winner all around.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Bitter taste in mouth
customer_reviews.text: Nasty !!!!! Bitter the watermelon one nasty !!! And bitter I almost threw up from the bitter taste ! Yuck !
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this as an alternative to nut butters but honestly, the taste is so awful and bitter that I couldn’t even finish one teaspoon of it. Also the texture is very runny so it would be difficult to put it on a cracker or a sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: LKA

customer_reviews.title: Chocolatey
customer_reviews.text: I would like it to be a little thicker & less runny. I like the sunflower butter much better than almond butter. It definitely has a great chocolate flavor without being strong on the sweet side, but I'm never against sweet ... :)
customer_reviews.author: Surprised

customer_reviews.title: Great peanut butter alternative
customer_reviews.text: Flavor takes some getting use to but I put these on hard crackers and it keeps me full for a very long time ! Great nutrition in a convenient package.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. from BK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nut butter replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my wife is allergic to nuts. First used it in a banana bread recipe. No one could tell it wasn’t almond butter. My wife now uses it for peanut butter and jelly sandwiches and is so delighted to be able to indulge! This brand is really delicious and a fantastic value for the price. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Robin G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: My 4YO is allergic to nuts so I appreciate alternatives no matter the cost (and these are costly but worth it). Quite delicious. Not overly sweet but more subtle. Good on English muffins and other types of bread. The chocolate ones are good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rated R Cars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thank you 88 acres for providing an alternative to nut butters. I am a fan. I have nut allergies and this product is absolutely terrific. I put it on toast for breakfast or sometimes just take a spoonful out. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS SEED BUTTER!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! The consistency of tahini but a more delicious flavor. So happy that it comes unsweetened! I love to vary my nut butters and it’s great to find a seed butter so good!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Should probably order a few when you buy it
customer_reviews.text: I could literally eat this entire jar in 1 sitting it is so good. I would recommend buying at least two, so once you eat the first one you have another while you order more.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Doran

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not enough flavor.
customer_reviews.text: This is very good but needs more maple flavor. I normally purchase the chocolate and thought I’d give this a try. Hopefully buy the time I finish the two jars it will grow in me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Tasty stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tasty healthy natural seed butter. I just wish the exp date was a little further out. I doubt I will use both jars within 8 months :( I was able to taste test all of their seed butters at a local food expo, and they are all quite good.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla spiced
customer_reviews.text: Pros: tastes like vanilla spice tea. Reminds me of a crisp fall day. Delicious as a spread and topped on top of fruit. Free from peanuts. Cons: pricey . Difficult to mix together. Taste is very strong
customer_reviews.author: candi

customer_reviews.title: Yum yums
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what I was getting into when I bought this but it blew my mind! Looks kinda weird but tastes amazing! It’s not very solid so don’t expect it to have the same consistency as peanut butter ...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Badaro

customer_reviews.title: It's a really weird green color.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson fell in love with this seed butter. It's nice because he can take sandwiches made with it to his nut free school and camp. I was a bit put off by the strange color but he thinks it's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: this is such a healthy choice of butters. This chocolate taste is delicious and gives you a sweet taste when needed. this is not Nutella, so don't compare. This is so much better than Nutella.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to nut butters and sun butter. The flavor is great—not too salty or sweet. My son goes to a nut-free school and he loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: More than just pumpkin seeds...
customer_reviews.text: Read the label! I wanted ground pumpkin seeds specifically due to a dietary protocol. A product I purchased before but it must have been from a different manufactuere - what I got was a butter that included sunflower oil and sugar... both ingredients I should not have.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Spiegelberg

customer_reviews.title: Yummy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to make more of the Living Proof bourbon cocktail recipe offered by shaker and spoon. Pumpkin seed butter is tasty- kind of like cashew butter. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: whitluvsshoes

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great way to curb your sweet tooth. A small amount on a pretzel or banana is satisfying. Little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: R. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a low FODMAP diet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this as an easy to prepare, low FODMAP option for lunch. She spreads it on Udi's gluten free bread.
customer_reviews.author: H F

customer_reviews.title: School friendly chocolate seed spread (Nutella wanna be)
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this and I can pack it up for school lunches & snacks. I looked all over Chicago for a school friendly option and this was only place I found it! Wish it was sold individually but I’ll eventually go thru 2 containers. Sugar is moderate, think 5g per serving, less than done regular but butters but if skipping jelly hoping it balances out,
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: It is by far the best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I will forever buy this nut butter. I add it to smoothies, on toast, and even eat it off a spoon! It is by far the best I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Parks

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I have a nut allergy, so I'm not new to sunflower butters. I was so excited about this one, but it tastes weird and has a grainy texture.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: dark chocolate which I love. I only gave it a 4 out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Grainy texture as long as that doesn't bother you. The flavor is a deep, dark chocolate which I love. I only gave it a 4 out of 5 because I have found one other kind I have liked better, unfortunately they stopped selling it.
customer_reviews.author: MH-Fam

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My son has a peanut and tree nut allergy and this makes a tasty substitute. As a (now previous) peanut butter lover I even like it myself.
customer_reviews.author: KAustin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the texture and color fool you! This is delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 88 acres is on to something wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars- the combo of maple sugar to sweeten the butter. OMG!! The smooth blend and texture. 4 stars - However, the taste of sunflower seeds in ratio to the blend, need to be increased for more of its flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and having something as an alternative to nut butter than I can spread on pancakes and toast.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: ordered the dark chocolate sunflower seed butter and it was a thumbs down from my family. None of us enjoyed the taste. Didn't like the texture either. It's not creamy like a seed butter. It was hard and clumpy and wouldn't stir. We do however like the granola bars from 88 acres.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yummy!
customer_reviews.text: so incredibly yummy... great alternative to peanut butter for my peanut-allergic kiddo. I loved it myself too. Better than candy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and delicious. I never believed anything could be better than peanut butter but I was wrong. Pumpkin seed butter from 88 Acres is tops on my list.
customer_reviews.author: Summerspirit49

customer_reviews.title: Best Pumpkin butter!
customer_reviews.text: I have urinary issues and need to take supplements with Pumpkin seed. This is a good way to not only treat my symptoms but also get more protein and beneficial oils into my diet. It is also delicious, the best tasting out of four other products I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: patricia l goldstein

customer_reviews.title: ADULTERATED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: LOADED WITH SUGAR OIL AND SALT VERY SWEET RANCID TASTE.GOT VERY SICK WITH MINOR FOOD POISIONING BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Sweetened ones have too much sugar, unsweetened tastes gross
customer_reviews.text: I could only find the sweet version in stores and liked them alright but thought they were way to sweet. So I bought these. Without any sweetener they taste semi rancid to me.
customer_reviews.author: Margot G

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Worst liquid versus solid. The liquid was all over the box. Jar, lid, and everywhere. A very unhappy shopper especially since the item can’t be returned and refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love this butter on toast for breakfast - I used to buy the tiny packets in the grocery store. This is a much better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L Gauvin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this item, as I had tried sunflower seed butter and did not like it that much. I prefer to refrigerate it though, since when left out it is a bit too liquidy for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny De Silva

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nut free alternative to Nutella but I thought the chocolate flavor wasn’t that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The BEST ever! Excellent ingredients and taste yummy. I eat with strawberries!
customer_reviews.author: Birdwatching04

customer_reviews.title: Tasty healthy food
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely tasty. Love it on toast or waffles. Grandson loves it on a banana.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor from the sample pack I ordered! So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters favorite non nut butter. Better than nutella. One of the containers was open when the package arrived, bit contacted 88 acres and they will send a replacement. Excellent customer service and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Allergy alert
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter broke out in hives with this. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Pina P Follano

customer_reviews.title: Bland, no flavor, needs more salt.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it may need more salt. I added more maple syrup but it didn’t improve the flavor. I have tried 3 other brands which all were very delicious. I eat the butter right out of the jar or with crackers. A lot of it too! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: jimi vickers

customer_reviews.title: Spreads well, great flavor, a tad pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent alternative to nut spreads for those with but allergies. I use this in an EOE diet.
customer_reviews.author: Gruntswife

customer_reviews.title: Soooo oily!
customer_reviews.text: It is sooo oily you make a mess just opening the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids who have peanut allergies. They love it. Personally, I think it tastes rather perfumey. And I’m Not a picky eater. Next time I will order a plain sunbutter. Nice idea, just overwhelming flavor.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMama

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is allergic to nuts loves this! She is so happy that she gets to have a chocolate spread that is allergy friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Palermo

customer_reviews.title: 😢
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know it has added sugar, 3g per serving. Very sweet, too sweet for me. Thought I was getting pumpkin seed butter with nothing added except oil and possibly a little salt.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: GRAINY AND FLAVORLESS
customer_reviews.text: There are many better options for less money. Bought after someone in my allergy moms group recommended. Thick like a paste and grainy. My son said dry. Very little flavor. Threw it out, so threw away $20.
customer_reviews.author: Gustav W.

customer_reviews.title: Great protein for nut allergies
customer_reviews.text: This a great alternative to nut butters and sunflower butter. It tastes just like pumpkin seeds. The green color is fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: AVM

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: It adds flavor to salads, as a base to a dressing. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Tasty alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of this product. I have a nut allergy and this is a great alternative to peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not as expected or as nutritious.
customer_reviews.text: Not edible which was a surprise. The consistency was runny, taste & smell was unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Food that is not only good, but good for you!
customer_reviews.text: We love your pumpkin seed butter. Great taste and healthy for you.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McCracken

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: It's the most delicious sunflower butter I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Best food I eat every day
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooooo gooooooood!! My wife and I have really cleaned up our diets, eating mostly plant based, and this on some whole grain bread every morning is easily one of the best things we’ll eat each and every day. I feel a little weird that we currently have 5 jars of this in the pantry... but when you love something, you go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Keith W

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 bottles that were not sealed and leaking! HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Scott

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth on whether to give this 4 or 5 stars. I decided on 5 because it really is amazing. The ONLY thing I don't like is that it has added sunflower oil, BUT that may be why it's so creamy. Which I love. So. Yeah... By far the best tasting seed or nut butter I've ever tried, with maybe the exception of one brand of almond butter. Its SO YUMMY. And super easy to stir and spread. A little pricey but so are all the other pumpkin seed butters. Really glad I found this bc I cant have any other nut butter right now. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fries

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet and comes in a plastic container
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet and comes in a plastic container. All other organic pumpkin seed butter samples that I have purchased on Amazon are unsweetened and come in a glass jar.
customer_reviews.author: Union99

customer_reviews.title: Funny taste. :(
customer_reviews.text: This tasted sort of like dirt, like it is old or something. I also ordered the vanilla spice flavor and that one is delicious, but the chocoat one doesn't taste right.
customer_reviews.author: proct044

product_meta.title: 88 Acres, Organic Vanilla Spiced Sunflower Seed Butter, Nut-Free, Non-GMO, Dairy-Free 14 Ounce, 2 Pack
feature_bullets: Just good nutrition - and that spiced vanilla with roasted sunflower - to seed a more 'deliciously dreamy’ kinda day.
Our seed butters are handcrafted in small batches using simple, wholesome, organic ingredients, to create a delicious snack everybody can enjoy
88 Acres Seed Butter is delicious on its own, or as a spread on toast, stirred into oatmeal or added to your morning smoothie, or add to your favorite recipe!
Great for athletes, low-FODMAP dieters, vegans, and omnivores alike.
Free from the eight most common food allergens- Gluten-Free, Nut-Free, Peanut-Free, Dairy-Free, Soy Free, Sesame Free. Plus- Non-GMO, Vegan, School Safe.
